H0.text: internet based test of english as a foreign language test. IELTS

H1.text: internet based test of english as a foreign language test. Duolingo English Test

H2.text: internet based test of english as a foreign language test. Cambridge English exams

H3.text: internet based test of english as a foreign language test. TOEFL

A4.text: The TOEFL iBT test has been introduced in phases, with the United States, Canada, France, Germany, and Italy in 2005 and the rest of the world in 2006, with test centers added regularly.

A5.text: It is offered weekly at authorized test centers.
